10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.netbeans;
11  
12  import javax.swing.text.BadLocationException;
13  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
14  
15  import org.netbeans.modules.editor.indent.api.Reformat;
16  import org.openide.text.NbDocument;
17  import org.openide.util.Exceptions;
18  
19  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.FormatterAdvice;
20  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.IFormatterStrategy;
21  
22  /**
23   *
24   * @author markiewb
25   * @author bahlef
26   */
27  public class NetBeansFormatterStrategy implements IFormatterStrategy {
28  	/**
29  	 * @param fa the {@link FormatterAdvice}
30  	 */
31  	@Override
32  	public void format(FormatterAdvice fa) {
33  		StyledDocument document = fa.getStyledDocument();
34  
35  		Reformat rf = Reformat.get(document);
36  		rf.lock();
37  
38  		// only care about selection if reformatting on menu action and not on file save
39  		int _dot = !fa.isForSave() ? fa.getSelectionStart() : -1;
40  		int _mark = !fa.isForSave() ? fa.getSelectionEnd() : -1;
41  
42  		try {
43  			NbDocument.runAtomicAsUser(document, new NetBeansFormatterRunnable(document, rf, _dot, _mark));
44  		} catch (BadLocationException ex) {
45  			Exceptions.printStackTrace(ex);
46  		} finally {
47  			rf.unlock();
48  		}
49  	}
50  
51  	@Override
52  	public boolean canHandle(StyledDocument document) {
53  		return true;
54  	}
55  }
